staffArray.name: John McDaniel
staffArray.description: Pastor John McDaniel is the Senior Pastor of our church. With many years of preaching experience and a deep love for the Lord, John consistently teaches the word of God with a passion.

staffArray.name: Chad Fernandes
staffArray.description: Our Praise and Worship leader, Chad, leads the congregation in songs of praise to the Lord.

staffArray.name: Debbie Stone
staffArray.description: Debbie is our dedicated church secretary that has sered our church for many years.
